name: gridify
description: Simple code to add a root-element-relative vertical rhythm checker to a web page. Inspired by Sassline.

scripts.build:bookmarklet:
echo "javascript:\c" > gridify.bookmarklet.js && browserify gridify.js -t [ babelify --blacklist useStrict ] -t [ uglifyify --no-sourcemap ] | tr -d '
' >> gridify.bookmarklet.js; echo "void(0);\c" >> gridify.bookmarklet.js

author: Noah Chase
